attributes.action: Increase number of guests at weddings based on to latest venue capacity increase
attributes.additional_details: It's unfair that sporting/gigs/theatre to have an increase in venue capacity without considering other events like weddings/funerals which usually have a list which is traceable and when they are usually limited to close friends / family rather than thousands of members of the general public. Every time a couple has to delay a wedding it can cost them and the venues hundreds if not thousands in rescheduling.
attributes.background: With the latest increase in venue capacity allowing 4000 or 50% of capacity for stadiums / 1000 or 50% for indoor venues (theatres etc) weddings/funerals should receive the same increase in capacity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
